name: Ludum Date
description:
The big night is here, and despite dozens of scheduling issues, you finally have her all for yourself...

Or so you thought.

Experience the joys of meeting the girl of your dreams while you tackle the incredibly hard task of keeping her attention all to yourself.

Fight against a smartphone that rings every 10 seconds incessantly and do your best to make this the date you dreamed of.

Created for Ludum Dare 51
The game was published under the Extra category, so it's still under development! Check at a later date to play it in an actual working state!
